posts.post_content:
The following cards are offered for sale.

1. "Honest" John Anderson with an Old Mill back in SGC 50 condition for SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10031/anderson-om[/IMG]

2.  Birdie Cree with a Piedmont 350 back in SGC 40 condition for SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10308/cree[/IMG]

3.  Rube Geyer with a Piedmont 350-460 back in SGC 30 condition SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10251/geyer[/IMG]

4.  Frank King, a Southern Leaguer with the Old Mill SL back, in SGC 20 condition SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10262/king-omsl[/IMG]

5. Bob Ganley with a Piedmont 150 back in SGC 10 condition for SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10250/ganley[/IMG]

All prices include shipping.

Any form of payment is accepted: Check, MO, PP F&F

If you prefer regular PP, please add $1 per card.

What are you waiting for? .... The PSA 5 - 4 - 3 - 2 - 1 Sale.  Coming soon.

Operators will be available around the clock to take you order. ;););)

It's not too late to bid on the two left.

Prices reduced.
